name: East Meet East, Inc.
description: Operator of an online dating platform intended to help users find like-minded friends and partners. The company's platform assists users to form real-time connections with members of their own communities, enabling users to find people with mutual backgrounds and interests.
one_liner: Operator of an online dating platform intended to help users find like-minded friends and partners. The company's platform assists users to form real-time connections with members of their own communities, enabling users to find people with mutual backgrounds and interests.
